text: NESTED SUB-QUERIES: REWRITE SELECT name FROM sailors AS S WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM reserves AS R WHERE|S.sid = R.sid AND R.day = '2018-10-15" ) SELECT name FROM sailors AS S, reserves AS R WHERE S.sid = R.sid AND R.day = '2018-10-15"' . . @ >=-CMU-DB S = L - . ; y C4 â€” PI 4 vorsa/10855 -POSTORESOPTIMEND e svnoo- 15 - Query Planning & Optimization Il (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
